    public final class PreferenceGroupAssert
extends AbstractPreferenceGroupAssert<PreferenceGroupAssert,android.preference.PreferenceGroup>
    Assertions for PreferenceGroup instances.

    This class is final. To extend use AbstractPreferenceGroupAssert.
